text.p: These are the leading stories in the Mozambican press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Thieves have stolen 16 lights from the main runway at Maputo international airport, despite increased security in the wake of a spate of airport thefts.

- The international donor community has pledged to provide $8.5 million for a development project in northern Mozambique known as "Niassa 2000". The money will be used for education, health, agriculture, roadworks and water supply.
